column3: 支援品ランクアップ

レスタニア中部に広がる大平原
白竜が墜ちた地として神殿が築かれ、人々が集った
ことから、全ての民にとって寄り所と言える地域に
なった。そのため、比較的魔物の勢力は弱いが
オークなど強力な魔物の侵入は脅威となる
column4:
A large plain spread across central Lestania.
A temple was built where the White Dragon fell,
and it became an area that can be said
to be a stronghold for all people.
Therefore, although nearby monsters
are relatively weak, the intrusion of more
powerful demons such as Orcs pose a threat.

column3:
白竜が座すレスタニアの中心地
覚者と白騎団の本拠地であるだけでなく、神殿周囲
には商店区、宿場区、港が築かれ都市となった
３００年に渡り、人々はこの地で竜に寄り添い
暮らしを営んでいる
column4:
Not only the home of the Arisen,
the White Dragon sits at the center of Lestania.
With a temple built around them,
over 300 years a bustling city grew,
with a relay station, harbor,
and shopping district.

column3:
ハイデル平原南部に位置する村
ワインなど果実酒造りが盛んだったが、近年は不作
と原因不明の病により活力が落ちつつある
この異変には、廃屋化したハイデル教会が何らか
の形で関わるのではと噂されている
column4:
A village located in the southern part
of Hidell Plains. Viticulture of fruit wines
was a thriving trade, but in recent years,
trade and health have declined from bad crop
harvests and a mysterious disease.
After rumors about the nearby Hidell Chapel's
involvement surfaced, the chapel has since
been abandoned.

column3:
ハイデル平原とミスリウ森林を繋ぐ橋は以前の
水害で損壊したが、テルで資材手配が可能
となり、ようやく修復された
これでポーン郷、リンウッド方面との往来は
回復するだろう
column4:
The bridge that formerly had connected
the Hidell Plains and Mysree Forest
was destroyed by flood damage,
but resources can be arranged at Tel Village
to repair the broken bridge.
With this, the traffic to and from
Lynwood will be restored.

column3:
ハイデル南部、テル村に近い石造りの橋
ダウ渓谷方面との往来が盛んだった頃、この橋を通る
行商人が多かったことから、その襲撃に味を
しめたゴブリンにより度々占拠されるようになった
退治する者と小鬼のイタチごっこは現在も続いている
column4:
A stone bridge near Tel Village
in Southern Hidell. When traffic to and from
Dowe Valley was thriving, there were many
peddlers passing through this bridge,
which led goblins to occasionally occupy it.
Those who exterminate the small demons
on the bridge may still continue to do so.

column3:
テルの東にあるハイデル教会地下墓地
以前は祈りの場として訪れる者も多かったが
廃屋化して後、扉が開かれたことはない
夜間徘徊する亡者の目撃談もあり、今では誰も
教会に近づかなくなっている
column4:
Hidell Chapel catacombs located to the east
of Tel village. Previously visited by many
as a place of prayer, the doors to the catacombs
have not been opened since its abandonment.
Eyewitnesses report sighting the deceased
wandering the grounds at night;
nobody has approached chapel since.

column3:
テル村、廃墟の地下倉庫に存在する目的不明の
地下道。民家の地下室にこのような場所がある
ことを巡り、その昔ある事件があったらしいが
語る者はおらず、忘れられようとしている
column4:
An underground warehouse of unknown purpose
near Tel village, which exists in the ruins.
There is a place like this in the basement
of many a house, but there seems to have been
an incident in the past, and there is no one
to speak of it, as it is trying to be forgotten.

column3:
平原中央付近の河原。グリッテン砦以北の川上から
さまざまな物――戦場の残がいや遺体――が流れ
つくことから、その名で呼ばれるようになった
血の臭いに魅かれたリザードマンが棲みつくように
なり、現在は危険地域に指定されている
column4:
The riverbank near the central plains.
It came to be called that because various things,
such as remnants of battlefields and corpses,
flowed down from the upstream of the river
north of Gritten Fort.
Saurians, who were drawn to the smell of blood,
settled there and it is now designated as a
dangerous area.

column3:
ハイデル街道全域を脅かす野盗《黒狼団》のアジト
強力な首領が束ねており、騎士団や覚者と度々
衝突してきた。結果、アジトは戦陣のように物物しく
なっている。街道を通る際は彼らへの警戒を
忘れてはならない
column4:
The hideout of the bandit group "Black Wolf Gang"
threatens the entire Hidell Highway.
They are led by a powerful leader and have
frequently clashed with the Knight Order
and the Arisen. As a result,
their hideout has become like a battlefield.
When passing through the highway,
one must not forget caution.

column3:
ハイデル地下霊廟には、疫病で死んだ者や罪人
のみを埋葬する下層階が存在する
より強い瘴気が溜まっており、特別な用でも
ない限り足を踏み入れるべき場所ではない
column4:
In the Hidell Catacombs, there is a lower level
where only those who died from disease
or criminals are buried.
It accumulates a stronger miasma,
so it is not a place to step into lightly
without a special reason.

column3:
ハイデル地下霊廟には秘密の最下層があり
邪教の礼拝堂があるとも噂されていた
その噂は過去にテルで起こった事件から
発したものであるらしいが、真相は不明
column4:
In the Hidell Catacombs, there is said to exist
a secret lowest level; it is rumored
to be used as a cult's chapel.
The origin of this rumor seems to stem
from an incident that occurred in Tel in the past,
but the truth remains unknown.

column3:
テルの西、《アーク》に近い通路
元は特筆すべきこともないただの通路だったが
付近を通りかかった人々から、ここで耳慣れぬ
金属が擦れるような音を聞いたという噂が
流れ始めたため、調査の対象となった
column4:
In the western part of Tel, near the Ark,
there was a passage with nothing particularly
notable about it.
However, rumors started circulating among
the people who passed by that they heard
unfamiliar sounds, like the scraping of metal,
coming from this hallway. Because of this,
it became the subject of investigation.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
動乱のおりに一度は廃墟化したものの
現在は見習い騎士や新人覚者の修行場として
新たな役割を担っている
column4:
In the olden days, one of the altars of
the White Dragon, worshiped in various places,
was once in ruins during the upheavals.
However, it is now fulfilling a new role
as a training ground for apprentice knights
and novice Arisen.
